articles.title: 'Surprised and disappointed.' Doctors in Covid-19 hotspots last year are seeing new record hospitalizations - CNN
articles.description: With the more contagious Delta variant of Covid-19 sweeping across the country this summer, health care workers and officials are finding themselves returning to a crisis experienced last year when hospitals struggled to handle an influx of patients.
